name: wordpress-string-locator
description: Find and edit code or texts in your themes and plugins.
author: instawp

scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/javascript/string-locator.js src/javascript/string-locator-search.js src/javascript/string-locator-replace.js src/javascript/string-locator-instawp.js
scripts.build: wp-scripts build src/javascript/string-locator.js src/javascript/string-locator-search.js src/javascript/string-locator-replace.js src/javascript/string-locator-instawp.js
